text: The 1996–97 Marquette Golden Eagles men's basketball team represented the Marquette University in the 1996–97 season. The Golden Eagles finished the regular season with a record of 22–9. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style=| Conference USA Tournament |- !colspan=9 style=| NCAA Tournament 2008-09 Marquette Golden Eagles men's basketball media guide.
